name: Dragon Slayer (Pocket Money)
overview: Dragon slayer is a text adventure where you must slay the dreaded, evil Silver Dragon and its cohorts, the Red Goblins. In order to do so, you also need the protection of the pendant of the warlock Rexel. Alas, it has been stolen... The inlay simply gives your task as: "To be the hero you have to kill dragons and evil wizards for a great prize."
